org.apache.flink.runtime.state.memory

类 AbstractMemStateSnapshot<K,N,SV,S extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State,SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.memory.AbstractMemStateSnapshot<K,N,SV,S,SD>
  • 类型参数:
    K - The type of the key in the snapshot state.
    N - The type of the namespace in the snapshot state.
    SV - The type of the value in the snapshot state.
    所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, Serializable, AutoCloseable, KvStateSnapshot<K,N,S,SD,MemoryStateBackend>, StateObject
    直接已知子类:
    MemFoldingState.Snapshot, MemListState.Snapshot, MemReducingState.Snapshot, MemValueState.Snapshot

    public abstract class AbstractMemStateSnapshot<K,N,SV,S extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State,SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?>>
extends Object
implements KvStateSnapshot<K,N,S,SD,MemoryStateBackend>
    A snapshot of a MemValueState for a checkpoint. The data is stored in a heap byte array, in serialized form.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AbstractMemStateSnapshot

        public AbstractMemStateSnapshot(org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer,
                                org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<N> namespaceSerializer,
                                org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<SV> stateSerializer,
                                SD stateDesc,
                                byte[] data)
        Creates a new heap memory state snapshot.
        参数:
        keySerializer - The serializer for the keys.
        namespaceSerializer - The serializer for the namespace.
        stateSerializer - The serializer for the elements in the state HashMap
        stateDesc - The state identifier
        data - The serialized data of the state key/value pairs

    • 方法详细资料

      • createMemState

        public abstract KvState<K,N,S,SD,MemoryStateBackend> createMemState(HashMap<N,Map<K,SV>> stateMap)

      • restoreState

        public KvState<K,N,S,SD,MemoryStateBackend> restoreState(MemoryStateBackend stateBackend,
                                                         org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer,
                                                         ClassLoader classLoader)
                                                  throws Exception
        从接口复制的说明: KvStateSnapshot
        Loads the key/value state back from this snapshot.
        指定者:
        restoreState 在接口中 KvStateSnapshot<K,N,S extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State,SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?>,MemoryStateBackend>
        参数:
        stateBackend - The state backend that created this snapshot and can restore the key/value state from this snapshot.
        keySerializer - The serializer for the keys.
        classLoader - The class loader for user-defined types.
        返回:
        An instance of the key/value state loaded from this snapshot.
        抛出:
        Exception - Exceptions can occur during the state loading and are forwarded.

      • discardState

        public void discardState()
        Discarding the heap state is a no-op.
        指定者:
        discardState 在接口中 StateObject

      • getStateSize

        public long getStateSize()
        从接口复制的说明: StateObject
        Returns the size of the state in bytes.

        If the the size is not known, return 0.

        指定者:
        getStateSize 在接口中 StateObject
        返回:
        Size of the state in bytes.
